description:
confirm_resize is trying to update the destination resource tracker, not the source.  The source should be updated to reflect we should not be reserving space for the instance anymore...

This bug has a side effect of creating a somewhat duplicate entry in the compute_nodes table.
title: confirm_resize tries to update dest resource tracker
